EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_7AM Reactive data-pipelines with Spring XD and Kafka.Reminder 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: Reactive data-pipelines with Spring XD and Kafka
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, We are looking forward to having you join today's webinar Reactive data-pipelines with Spring XD and Kafka with Marius Bogoevici & Mark Pollack. If you haven't done so yet, we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, April 28, 2015 Europe: 2:00pm GMT (London, GMT) 3:00pm BST Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?MTID=e9c1b6599b5fde88a571fa3d0682dad49> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 660 962 931 Thank you,
